titleStmt.title: Religious perfection: or, A third part of the enquiry after happiness. By the author of Practical Christianity
Enquiry after happiness. Part 3.
titleStmt.author: Lucas, Richard, 1648-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Smith and Benj. Walford, at the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: The author of Practical Christianity = Richard Lucas.
